sentences.en: a brain scan
sentences.cn: 脑部扫描

sentences.en: A brain scan last Friday finally set his mind at rest.
sentences.cn: 上周五的脑部扫描终于让他放心了。

sentences.en: A routine scan revealed abnormalities in the fetus.
sentences.cn: 一次常规扫描发现胎儿畸形。

sentences.en: A routine scan revealed abnormalities in the foetus.
sentences.cn: 一次常规扫描发现胎儿畸形.

sentences.en: A scan determines the position of the baby in the womb.
sentences.cn: 扫描可以确定胎儿在子宮中的位置.

sentences.en: All luggage has to be scanned at the airport.
sentences.cn: 所有行李在机场都得接受扫描检查。

sentences.en: He had written a few poems. Sid told him they didn't scan.
sentences.cn: 他写了几首诗。锡德告诉他那几首诗都不押韵。

sentences.en: He scanned the horizon, but there was no sign of the ship.
sentences.cn: 他朝地平线处仔细眺望，但是找不到那艘船的踪影。

sentences.en: He was rushed to hospital for a brain scan.
sentences.cn: 他被火速送往医院做脑部扫描。

sentences.en: He will scan the Rockefeller Archives for more Winter data.
sentences.cn: 他要在洛克菲勒档案库中继续搜寻更多的有关温德的资料.

sentences.en: I just had a quick scan through your book again.
sentences.cn: 我只是又快速浏览了一遍你的书。

sentences.en: Most women will be offered an ultrasound scan during pregnancy, although it's not obligatory.
sentences.cn: 大多数处于妊娠期的妇女将被建议接受超声波检查，不过这不是强制性的。

sentences.en: My fingers scan a book in braille.
sentences.cn: 我的手指扫描着一本盲文书.

sentences.en: Sampras awaits the results of a bone scan on a painful left shin.
sentences.cn: 桑普拉斯等待着疼痛的左腿胫骨的骨骼扫描结果。

sentences.en: She scanned his face, looking for signs of what he was thinking.
sentences.cn: 她端详着他的脸，想知道他在想些什么。

sentences.en: She scanned through the paper.
sentences.cn: 她浏览了一下报纸。

sentences.en: The paper she began to scan attracted his attention.
sentences.cn: 她开始翻阅的那份报纸引起了他的注意.

sentences.en: The scan showed that she was expecting twins.
sentences.cn: 扫描显示她怀了双胞胎。

sentences.en: The specialist who carried out the brain scan thought Tim's chances of survival were still slim.
sentences.cn: 给蒂姆做脑部扫描的专科医生认为他活下来的可能性仍旧渺茫。

sentences.en: The verses scan well.
sentences.cn: 这些诗很合韵律.

sentences.en: Video cameras scanned the car park.
sentences.cn: 摄像机监视着停车场。

sentences.en: Whirr, click, whirr, click — step by step the scan probed deeper.
sentences.cn: 嗡嗡，咔嗒，嗡嗡，咔嗒——扫描探查一步步地深入。

sentences.en: 英文例句:You scan the text into the computer, then edit it.
sentences.cn: 把文本扫描进电脑，然后进行编辑。

words.tran_cn: 扫描的；观测的；搜索的；扫掠的
[计] 扫描仪；扫描器；光电子扫描装置

phrases.tran_cn: 计算机X射线轴向分层造影扫描图
abbr. 检验胴体尤其是脑部新陈代谢的断层扫描（Positron Emission Tomography Scan）；正电子发射层析扫描（pet scanning）

trans.tran_cn: 扫描检查，胎儿扫描检查，浏览
trans.tran_en: a medical test in which a special machine produces a picture of something inside your body

trans.tran_cn: 粗略地看，细看，扫描，符合格律
trans.tran_en: to examine an area carefully but quickly, often because you are looking for a particular person or thing
to examine an area carefully but quickly, often because you are looking for a particular person or thing
